headline: Acting Deputy Assistant Director at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)

defaultPosition.description: Presently serve as the Acting Deputy Assistant Director at Homeland Security Investigations (HSI) International Operations. I am responsible for providing policy, guidance and overseeing and managing the overall operational and programmatic activities of over 400 personnel including over 200 Special Agents, 8 Liaison officers and 3 Senior Executive Service employees deployed to 66 offices in 49 countries around the globe and a budget of approximately $160 million dollars.
defaultPosition.title: Acting Deputy Assistant Director

positions.description: Presently serve as the Acting Deputy Assistant Director at Homeland Security Investigations (HSI) International Operations. I am responsible for providing policy, guidance and overseeing and managing the overall operational and programmatic activities of over 400 personnel including over 200 Special Agents, 8 Liaison officers and 3 Senior Executive Service employees deployed to 66 offices in 49 countries around the globe and a budget of approximately $160 million dollars.
positions.title: Acting Deputy Assistant Director

positions.description: This position is responsible for the direction and oversight of the Illicit Trade, Travel, and Financial Division.  The division encompasses investigations relating to national security, financial, narcotics, Immigration fraud, gangs, and the Boarder Enforcement Task Forces, which involves a wide range of skills, duties and responsibilities.  Primary aspects of this position include the daily monitoring of 8 subordinate supervisors and other staff personnel to ensure that the National Priorities are being executed.
positions.title: Associate Deputy Assistant Director
